```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}

customer_data <-
  fread("data/marketing_campaign.csv")


ggplot(customer_data, aes(x = MntWines, fill = Education)) +
  geom_density() +
  facet_wrap(~Education, scales = "free")
```
